input:
Write an ad for the following product

App: LangLang is an app that (1) allows you to track your language development, and (2) finds teachers that match what you need to improve on.

Tone: comical, informative
sentences: Are you learning a new language and feeling a little lost? LangLang is here to help! With our app, you can track your language development and find teachers that match what you need to improve on.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With our easy-to-use interface, you can track your language development and find teachers that perfectly match your needs.
Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With our easy-to-use tracking system, you can keep track of your progress and find the right teacher to help you improve.

Tone: comical, informative
sentences:
Hey, you!

Yes, you, the person who's always wanted to learn a new language but never seems to have the time. Well, guess what?

LangLang is the perfect app for anyone looking to improve their language skills! With LangLang, you can track your language development and find teachers that match what you need to improve on. With LangLang, learning a new language is easy and fun!

Write an ad for the following product

Product: Qoola is a versatile wearable device that provides air conditioning and air purification functions at the same time. It stainless technology creates air with a wide range of temperature for all four seasons. Its air purification function clean the air by removing various pollutants in the air. Negative Air Ions technology to provide you with great air quality.

Tone: child friendly, elder friendly, family friendly, kind, warm

Audience: people with respiratory conditions
sentences: Do you suffer from respiratory conditions? Do you find yourself uncomfortable in certain environments because of the air quality? Introducing Qoola, the versatile wearable device that provides air conditioning and air purification functions at the same time!

Qoola is a versatile wearable device that provides air conditioning and air purification functions at the same time. It stainless technology creates air with a wide range of temperature for all four seasons. Its air purification function clean the air by removing various pollutants in the air.

Looking for a device that can help with your respiratory conditions? Look no further than Qoola! Our versatile wearable device provides air conditioning and air purification functions at the same time, and our stainless technology creates air with a wide range of temperature for all four seasons.
